title: That General Committee approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC23-005, dated October 10, 2023 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That staff be authorized to proceed as outlined in Report CAOPC23-005 dated October 10, 2023 of the Chief Administrative Officer respecting the Non-Union Employee Group covering the period January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2027.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSRS23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the Commissioner, Legislative Services (Acting) as follows: That, respecting the property known municipally as 1576 Matchett Line, Township of Otonabee-South Monaghan, staff be directed to proceed as outlined in Closed Session Report LSRS23-011 dated October 10, 2023, of the Commissioner, Legislative Services (Acting).

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC23-007, dated October 23, 2023 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That David J. Potts be appointed as the Commissioner of Legislative Services for the City of Peterborough effective October 23, 2023.
That this meeting be adjourned at 5:55 p.m.
